question: How to lock phone orientation in Android to prevent landscape mode
answer:
// This forces a vertical screen.
setRequestedOrientation(ActivityInfo.SCREEN_ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT);

question: Android M Light and Dark status bar programmatically - how to make it dark again?
Drag & Drop Espresso
IllegalArgumentException: Could not locate call adapter for rx.Observable RxJava, Retrofit2
answer:
Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
    .baseUrl(endpoint)
    .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create())
    .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJavaCallAdapterFactory.create())
    .build();

question: glide force load cached image, don't care what resolution
answer:
Glide.with(mContext)
   .load(url)
   .diskCacheStrategy(DiskCacheStrategy.SOURCE)
   .into(imageView);

question: Token null Sign-in Google Account
answer:
GoogleSignInOptions gso = new GoogleSignInOptions.Builder(GoogleSignInOptions.DEFAULT_SIGN_IN)
                .requestIdToken(getString(R.string.default_web_client_id))
                .requestEmail()
                .build();
